    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String x,
            java.lang.String y)
        constructs a room object that has a name and can be entered
        Parameters:
        x - the name of the room that will be entered.
        y - is the short description of the room

    • Method Detail

      • getRoom

        public java.lang.String getRoom()
        getRoom() gets the name of the room
        Returns:
        name of the room

      • addExit

        public void addExit(Exit e)
        addExit adds an exit to a room
        Parameters:
        e, - exit to be added

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String item_query)
        Takes in player query and sends back an Item if the item is in the room or a null response if the item is not there.
        Parameters:
        item_query - is a string from the UI to the Player Class to room that represents the item the player wishes to pick up.
        Returns:
        Item object if the the desired item is in the room and accessible.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        addItem(Item) adds an item to the inventory
        Parameters:
        item - adds item to the inventory

      • description

        public java.lang.String description()
        description gives a description of the rooms
        Returns:
        String that is the description

      • isMoveValid

        public Room isMoveValid(java.lang.String s)
        isMoveValid checks through rooms exits to see if passed in string matches name of any of the exit options
        Parameters:
        s - door name passed in from user
        Returns:
        room object of next room (the one the user wants to go to)
